about_the_game:
You are a renowned ██████  ██████████ tasked with solving a case involving ███████████ events surrounding one of the ██████  ████████ corporations. At first glance, the case seems routine: missing █████████, strange ████, and unsettling ███████ among employees. However, the deeper you dive into this enigma, the clearer it becomes that much more is at stake than ██████████ secrets.

Game Features

  • Unique Reporting System
    Every action, discovery, and solved puzzle must be documented in reports you submit to your client. The thoroughness of your reports affects the game's progression, unlocking or concealing critical storylines.

  • Interactive Hidden Object Searches
    Find hidden clues in unexpected places—from archives and laboratories to secret rooms. Every discovered item has significance, whether it’s a broken cup, a mysterious letter, or an unusual flash drive.

  • Puzzles That Shape the Outcome
    Each puzzle is more than just a challenge; it’s part of a bigger picture. Decode ciphers, crack safes, and restore damaged documents to uncover more information and unravel the mystery further.

  • Dynamic Dialogue Choices
    Engage in conversations where your choices matter. Extract critical information, build trust, or manipulate suspects to advance your investigation.

  • Atmospheric Environments
    Explore richly detailed settings that evolve with the story. From high-tech offices to abandoned facilities, each location hides secrets waiting to be uncovered.

  • Multiple Endings
    Your decisions throughout the game determine the fate of the case, the corporation, and your reputation as an investigator. Choose wisely to unveil the truth or leave questions unanswered.

name: Reactoryx

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600/AMD Ryzen 3 1300X
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 4GB/AMD Radeon R9 380 4GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400/AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 6GB /AMD Radeon RX 590 8GB
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Immerse yourself in the captivating world of intrigue and investigation in “Reactoryx,” a unique detective game featuring hidden object searches, challenging puzzles, and uncovering mysteries that could change the course of history.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
